title: Induced emf from changing magnetic field

content.prompt:
A loop of wire enclosing an area of 1.5 m2 is placed perpendicular to a magnetic field. The field is given in teslas as a function of time t in seconds by

The induced emf in the loop at t = 3 s is most nearly

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
